page.title: 18GAMES WE PLAY AT SCHOOL (2)
page.content:
Class {5}are most likely to play most of the same games but here are a few others,{COPS AND ROBBERS,CHASE,FONZY, {AIRWOLF,STREET HAWK,THE YOUNG ONES, {JUMPING AND HANDSTANDS. Class {2 }have a few different ones,{ {TRAINS,GOOSE,STAR WARS,HE-MAN,FIGHTS, {CATS GOT THE MEASLES, DOCTOR WHO {AND EGGS,BACON,CHIPS AND PEAS.}
{Bulldog { }You play bulldog like this.You all stand at one end of the playground and the person who is IT stands in the middle of the playground.The person who is IT shouts someones name out and that person has to run to the other side of the playground without the person who is IT tigging them.If they get tug they are IT and you start again.If the person who is IT shouts bulldog everyone has to run.
